title: תפלה לאחר הניתוח | Prayer After Vaginoplasty Surgery, by the Em haBanim
author: the Em haBanim

coauthors.name: the Em haBanim
coauthors.bio: The Em haBanim is a transfeminine neo-Ḥassid. מוֹשִׁיבִי עֲקֶרֶת הַבַּיִת אֵם הַבָּנִים שְׂמֵחָה הַלְלוּ יָ-הּ

excerpt: "Prayer After Surgery" (תפלה לאחר הניתוח) by the Em haBanim is the fifth of seven prayers offered in their סדר תפילות לניתוח שינוי מין (The Em haBanim's Prayers for Vaginoplasty). . . .
content:
This prayer is the fifth of seven prayers in a seder tefilah introduced with the following statement:

Gender transition is a religious experience. These are the psalms and prayers I, the Em haBanim, said at every phase of the long process of preparing for and undergoing vaginoplasty. I offer this set of prayers to the community, so that we can live in deeper awareness of the fact that Hashem our God wants our transitions.

Source (Hebrew) Translation (English)
כשהיא תתעורר מן הניתוח, תטול ידיה ותאמר זה מיד.
When you awaken from surgery, wash your hands and say this immediately:
הֲרֵנִי מְקַבֶּלֶת עָלַי
אֶת מִצְוַת עֲשֵׂה
לִהְיוֹת תְּמִימָה עִם ה׳ אֱלֹקַי.
Behold I accept upon myself
the positive commandment
to be whole with Hashem my G-d.
בָּרוּךְ אַתָּה
ה׳ אֱלֹקֵינוּ
מֶלֶךְ הָעוֹלָם
הַטּוֹב וְהַמֵּטִיב.
Blessed are You,
Hashem, our G-d,
Ruler of the Universe,
the Good One Who does good.
וכשיחזור לה די כח, תקרא מזמור שיר חנוכת הבית לדוד ותתפלל את ההלל בלי ברכה.
And when you have enough energy, read Psalms 30 and pray all of Hallel without a blessing.

“Prayer After Surgery” (תפלה לאחר הניתוח) by the Em haBanim is the fifth of seven prayers offered in their סדר תפילות לניתוח שינוי מין (The Em haBanim’s Prayers for Vaginoplasty).
